titleInfo.title: Modelling of Parameterized Processes via Regression in the Model Space

name.namePart: ESANN 2016: European Symposium on Artificial Neural Networks, Computational Intelligence and Machine Learning

mods.abstract: We consider the modelling of parameterized processes, where the goal is to model the process for new parameter value combinations. We compare the classical regression approach to a modular approach based on regression in the model space: First, for each process parametrization a model is learned. Second, a mapping from process parameters to model parameters is learned. We evaluate both approaches on a real and a synthetic dataset and show the advantages of the regression in the model space.

titleInfo.title: Proceedings of 24th European Symposium on Artificial Neural Networks
